name: PHOENIX CONTACT GmbH & Co. KG
goal:
Phoenix Contact produces with a high vertical range of manufacture in ten countries all over the
world. The product range comprises components and system solutions for electricity generation and distribution including wind and solar, device and machine building as well as control cabinet engineering. A diverse
product range of modular terminal blocks and special-purpose terminals, printed circuit terminal
blocks and plug connectors, cable connection technology and installation accessories offers innovative components. Electronic interfaces and power supplies, automation systems on the basis
of Ethernet and wireless, safety solutions for man and machine, IT-security solutions, surge protection systems as well as software programs and tools provide installers and operators of systems as well as device
manufacturers with comprehensive systems. The automotive, renewable energy and infrastructure
markets are supported with holistic solution concepts including engineering and training services and
further service features according to their specific demands.
interests: Communication, Development, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Legislative activities regarding various fields of technology e.g. security, energy,..
